Text:
Problem: det hänger upp sig efter 425 MB nedladdat; "existing data length too large", Crimson Idol, the invisible boy.  Några tips ?


Got stuck after 425 MB, see above mentioned error message, any hints how to solve this ?
I´ve tried to download this but first it was wery ssllooowww, and now- even slower (no seeders I guess).
Whats goin´on? For a moment it came fast as hell, but then it stopped - AGAIN!!! F*ck, not very enjoyable... I´ve downloaded this many days now but this seems to be a never-ending story.
